item.title: DWS CEO Steps In as Private Credit Unit Struggles to Lure Cash
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A few months into his role as chief executive officer of Deutsche Bank AG’s asset management unit, Stefan Hoops presented shareholders his vision for growth with a “private debt muscle” as one key part of the strategy. Almost three years on, that plan is sputtering. Frankfurt-based D...
